title: Quote of the day "by vayne"
body:
Kid rages after first death playing top vayne intentionally feeds is 0/14 by 15 minutes, team plains he will lose accounts,  vayne says "LOL no i won't they never ban people". 

I paste link to the new harsh punishments, and giggle my ass off as the other 9 players agree to report her. Was comical to see the vayne suddenly try to right her feeding but alas too late kid eat a dick :P

replies.body: Dude, the post was great until you decided to drop to his level with the last 4 words. Fail.
dont insult people. Let them burn with shame as u look after them like a friend would
